review: the origin story for supergiant games the game that started it all for me falling in love with this company this one is definitely rough but it still is great and not even to mention the absolute masterpiece of an ost by darren korb
simple yet challenging game and you need to git gud if you want to complete it i am quitting after 7 hours midway through the game as i can no longer git gud but its a solid game still

this game has a cool design and how the paths just fall out of the sky looks amazing i think the gameplay is a bit boring you kill some enemies and collect some items there is not much more to it some achievements were really challenging i liked that

really good debut game it definitely shows a bit of age if youre playing it after hades or another newer supergiant title  especially in the gameplay which is somewhat simplistic and gets repetitive as well as in level design  but the narration music and characters add so much charm that its hard not to recommend at least trying this out youll see earlier implementations and concepts of some weapons and mechanics in hades too which is a fun easter egg

though i have some gripes with the gameplay its a generally pleasant experience the story really is the main attraction of this game and it delivers well on that front using the full potential of videogames as medium to do so while there are other games addressing the same themes i believe this game is still worth playing as its short and sweet
finished revisiting the game today it is still one of best indie games ever made has nice contained story good gameplay great artstyle

this game feels like an ancient epic turned into a video game beautiful art some of the best video game music ive ever heard syrupy voice of the ever present narrator and competent gameplay its an incredible package bound to be remembered for decades to come
its great

still my favorite supergiant game in 2025 if youre a newer fan with hades i recommend going back to this its important to recognize just how impressive the sound and voice work were for a new studio on an incredible debut game

a solemn tale of surviving as whatwas collapses around you the music vocal storytelling and visual style all contribute wonderfully  the gameplay is a predecessor to what hades has launched forward in recent history not quite as deep as new titles but the story  vibes are worth visiting a quick game to sprint through if youre not interested in minmaxing or 100 completion
